messages.subject: Autodidactic Radical Gathering of Homeschoolers in TN!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I m pretty sure it s ok to post this here.  Is there another list just for conference/gathering announcements? Here is the info for a fantastic three night
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

I'm pretty sure it's ok to post this here. Is there another list just
for conference/gathering announcements?

Here is the info for a fantastic three night gathering in the beautiful
mountains of eastern Tennessee. The dates are March 14th through the
17th. The cabins are super nice, a good size and have fully equipped
kitchens. (no tvs, no internet, though there is internet at another
building) We would love to see you there! There are 30 cabins in
all. (And RV and tent areas.) Twenty cabins are currently reserved
specifically for this gathering, thirteen of which are taken, last I
looked. The remaining cabins are also possibilities if not taken yet by
the general public. Here's the link for the yahoo group list. (though
the list description mentions the last gathering in November '08, not
the one coming up in March)

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AutodidacticRadicalGatheringofHomeschoolers/

Check out the database to see who has signed up for the upcoming
gathering! There is also a link for the state park (Roan Mt.) in the
links section. Then start planning on how you can join us!

Hope to see lots of you there!
